channel.title: Creating shops
channel.description:
Hi guys, so I wanted to create a staffzone with some shops (Shop id = 71) I spawned this npc (Sigmund The Merchant) as shop, now to make it work I added this to my client.java: [code] } else if (NPCID == 1285) { // Staff Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71; // Staff Shop [/code]
That should work, but it doesnt :S If I talk/trade to him, nothing happens. Some help please?

item.title: Creating shops
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Did you add it under your first click NPC?

Read full topic

item.title: Creating shops
item.dc:creator: @coolman44445 coolman44445
item.description:
@coolman44445 wrote:

Hi guys, so I wanted to create a staffzone with some shops (Shop id = 71) I spawned this npc (Sigmund The Merchant) as shop, now to make it work I added this to my client.java:

            } else if (NPCID == 1285) { // Staff Shop
                PutNPCCoords = true;
                WanneShop = 71; // Staff Shop

That should work, but it doesnt :S If I talk/trade to him, nothing happens.
Some help please?

Read full topic
